creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: recto: standing horse, seen from PL side; small shoe in square, LRC; verso: portion of study of timber framed houses
medium: Pen, brush and ink on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
signed: on back, at bottom edge, in pencil: [33]
title: Untitled, recto and verso [study of a horse, recto; fragment of architectural study, verso]
